group_1.textLeft: I just don't see what the Neo-Magius are up to.

group_1.textRight: I think they're probably targeting people@rather than [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones, but...
Mm...@I have no idea what they're really after.

group_1.textLeft: We know their hideout is the Kamihama Civic@Center, we should go straight there.

group_1.textRight: Momoko's group already went to scope it out.

group_1.textLeft: They said they felt a trace of residual magic,@from a member of the Tokime Clan,
but if they sense our magic around they@probably won't go back to that base.
If we could find any other places that@might be key to their operation...

group_1.textRight: A place for spreading Magical Girl Supremacy...@Ooh, I'm thinking, maybe the radio telescope?!

group_1.textLeft: It is a location with ties to the Magius.

group_1.textRight: So, seems like a good bet?

group_1.textLeft: I've been searching around there regularly,@but without success.
Additionally, if it detects anyone other than Touka,@it should trigger an alert in the basement here.

group_1.textRight: Alerts go straight to the computer room here.
Felicia, how's your search in the East been going?

group_1.textLeft: I've been going with Momoko's group,@but nothin's going on.
Plus I end up feeling bad for the chicks@living over there, they all seem down.

group_1.textRight: Everyone's in shock over what@happened with Kanagi and Mitama...

group_1.textLeft: It's getting more and more difficult@to tell what they're up to.
...[wait:1.2][chara:100201:voiceFull_fullvoice/section_103002/vo_full_103002-3-21][chara:100201:cheek_0][chara:100201:face_mtn_ex_051.exp3.json:motion_400][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]Kanagi?!

group_1.textRight: Whoa?!@What the heck?!
Maybe she was just bein' sneaky by joinin'@them so she could tell us their plans!

group_1.textLeft: There's no way...!
...Or so I thought, but you're spot on.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]For real?! That RULES.

group_1.textLeft: "I'll share with you the secrets of the Neo-Magius'@objective and upcoming plans."
"However, this opponent has a sharp nose,@so be sure to prepare for contingencies."
She's sent us a map of where to meet, too.
It's a public location, so it doesn't@seem like she wants to fight.

group_1.textRight: It's a win for us!@Woo-hoo!
No, hold on...couldn't she have just@messaged us the info directly?
Wanting to meet in person feels a little off...

group_1.textLeft: Maybe she's just worried about@leavin' traces or whatever?

group_1.textRight: If she wanted to tell us covertly, a little@one-on-one whispering would do.
And that "plan for contingencies" part?@Seems kinda fishy to me...

group_1.textLeft: That's right...
I don't want to doubt her, but Kanagi was@resolved when she defected to their side.
If she was planning to infiltrate them,@she could have told us ahead of time.
I'm still on the fence, but I'm@thinking it could be a trap...

group_1.textRight: Iroha and Sana are at Suitoku Temple,
should I call them and let@them know what's going on?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, please do.

group_1.textRight: Ah, in that case, we should talk to the oni chick too!
She's like this throwdown machine, yeah?@She gets this stuff.

group_1.textLeft: Honestly, I don't like it, but we should@hear what she has to say.
